title: Privacy, Security Focal Points At CES
teaser: From Goldkey's smart watch that can make encrypted phone calls, to the iWallet that prevents hackers from stealing your credit card information, tech companies at CES are focusing this year on privacy gadgets. Melissa Block talks to CNET's Lindsey Turrentine about the latest in personal privacy technology at this week's International Consumer Electronics Show.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
